summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing execution of an agreement with the State of Washington Department of Community Development for financial assistance to expand the Drug Abuse Resistance Education program for the 1991-92 school year; accepting the money when received; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1991 Budget of the Police Department; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund; establishing titles and salaries; and declaring the emergency therefor.
